name: Restorative Reentry
description: Today, a staggering 7 million Americans are currently behind bars or under the supervision of probation or parole; the vast majority of these individuals are people of color. The Restorative Reentry programming supports their transition back into the mainstream to strengthen their inner resources and their external circumstances for an optimal outcome. In both of the gender-specific programs, clients are paired with a case manager who has a broad knowledge base in community resources and the cri

howToGetIt: - There is a San Francisco Transitional Age Reentry program, as well as a Alameda County Restorative Reentry program. - If you'd like to learn more about the reentry programs, visit https://communityworkswest.org/our-work/restorative-reentry/. Alternatively, you can submit a request at info@communityworkswest.org or call (510) 268-8116 to learn more about the programs offered. - If you'd like for Community Works West to follow up with you directly, visit https://communityworkswest.org/contact/ and complete the form to leave your information.
